news.title: One of history's greatest mass migrations
news.abstract: Millions of Indians flee their homes from India to a newly-formed Pakistan, or in the opposite direction.

news.title: Suzuka 8 Hours: A 'magical' race like no other
news.abstract: It is the jewel in the crown of the FIM Endurance World Championship -- and the most important race on the calendar for Japanese motorcycle manufacturers.

news.title: The bridge that changed China forever
news.abstract: China may be home to both the longest and highest bridges in the world, but neither is as pioneering as the Nanjing Yangtze River Bridge.

news.title: The world's most popular locations on Instagram Stories
Is Aung San Suu Kyi the Mandela of Asia?
news.abstract: After spending 15 years under house arrest, democracy icon Aung San Suu Kyi explains her life outlook and why she doesn't harbor bitterness.

news.title: Why can't these Indians leave Saudi Arabia?
news.abstract: 7,700 Indian workers are stranded in Saudi Arabia after a series of layoffs. CNN gets access to one of the 20 camps where workers are stuck.

news.title: Heineken taps into Myanmar's beer market
news.abstract: We look into Myanmar's brewing beer market and find out why Heineken invested in a $60 million brewery outside of Yangon.
